title: It's my birthday, and I wanted to thank Riot
body:
I'm 17 as of July 5th, and I seriously can't thank Riot and their game enough for helping me connect to my friends and give me a god damn good time. We all get mad about this game sometimes, but I've had some undeniably amazing moments and I'll love this game for a long ass time. Thanks for making High School a bit more bearable and uh yeah
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Happy Birthday! It's nice to see this kinda post every once in a while. Have a great day, dude.
